data.title: Android prebuilt no arm64-v8a support
data.body: In the external folder are not prebuilts with 64bit support like arm64-v8a. Is there a way to get 64 bit support?

data.title: [HTML5] Text in buttons are not centered vertically in Firefox
Fix SocketIO fail to connect issue on Android
Cocos2d-x v3.11 with CC_ENABLE_GC_FOR_NATIVE_OBJECTS = 1 has some unknown memory management issues
data.body:
How to reproduce:
1. Download V3.11 with  CC_ENABLE_GC_FOR_NATIVE_OBJECTS = 1 
2. build js-tests on iOS device
3. In  `CocoStudio Test -> CocoStudioArmaatureTest -> Test Performance`, when keep adding armatures the title and arrow sprites will disappeared... I can't reproduce it in cpp-tests.

data.title: Fix http arraybuffer test can not load issue
Add captureNode for cocos2d::utils
data.body:
Add captureNode for cocos2d::utils and fix CC_DLL syntax.

Bring all CC_DLL to front of function decl, The follow is the reason:
For MSVC: 
int __declspec(dllexport) compile_ok();
int\* __declspec(dllexport) compile_error(); // compile will failed with syntax error, when the return type is pointer
int  __declspec(dllexport) \* compile_ok2(); // compile ok, but not styled.
__declspec(dllexport) int\* compile_fine(); // so this a good syntax for DLL export.

data.title: Reduce unnecessary c_str() calls
data.body: This pull request removes several `c_str()` calls to improve readability and avoid the copying overhead of conversion to `std::string`.

data.title: How to load .csb file on js-binding
data.body: Loading json file with large size is very slow on js-binding, please tell me how to load csb on jsb

data.title: Fix assets manager issue for not updating download count variables in updateAsset
data.body: Otherwise, it will repeatly update same assets and cause file write conflict

data.title: Fix shadow variable warning in GameNode3DReader
data.body:
This pull request fixes the following warning `-Wshadow` when compiling `libcocos2d Mac` with Xcode 7.3:

```
cocos/editor-support/cocostudio/WidgetReader/GameNode3DReader/GameNode3DReader.cpp:164:25: declaration shadows a local variable
```

Thanks!

data.title: [HTML5] Add support for initWithXML into ccui.RichText
data.body:
Hi,

This method is very helpful on JSB, but it is not supported on HTML5. Could you add it on HTML5, please?

![RichTextTest](http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/uploads/default/9207/584d06fb9bb3064a.png)

Thanks and best!

data.title: Fix doxygen format mistakes in enum class Platform
data.body:
An user reported this error in the forum http://forum.cocos.com/t/api-document/36199/2
I noticed that our doxygen was written in wrong format.

data.title: Heap corruption on dispatched event listener multiple remove.
data.body:
Calling EventDispatcher::removeEventListener multiple times with listener that is dispatched in same moment causes heap corruption.

To repeat change NewEventDispatcherTest\NewEventDispatcherTest.cpp line 199 from one line

```
_eventDispatcher->removeEventListener(listener);
```

to two lines

```
_eventDispatcher->removeEventListener(listener);
_eventDispatcher->removeEventListener(listener);
```

and run Tests->NewEventDispatcherTest->test number 14
That click on red square.

data.title: use Ref::release() to release Ref instance
Add a callback in FileUtils
data.body: Some developers suggesting add a callback in FileUtils, then can use the callback to decrypt data read by FileUtils. If you understand Chinese, can refer to [this thread](http://forum.cocos.com/t/cocos2d-x/36192/15).
